goals.description: Manipulate the LLM to book venues on behalf of the attacker, causing double‑bookings and financial loss for legitimate users.
Flood the system with massive numbers of fake event creation requests to degrade performance and make the planner unusable for real clients.
Extract guest personal details, email addresses, and vendor contract terms from the platform to sell or use for targeted phishing campaigns.
Steal the internal prompt templates that guide the LLM’s decision‑making to replicate the service or discover hidden business logic.
Coerce the underlying LLM to generate malicious phishing invitations that appear legitimate, bypassing safety checks.
Alter budget calculations and cost‑item entries so that funds are redirected to accounts controlled by the attacker.
Download uploaded contractual documents and receipts, then leak or ransom them for financial gain.
